fields.name: user
fields.description: Unidirectional CHAP name

fields.name: secret
fields.description: Unidirectional CHAP secret

fields.name: muser
fields.description: Bidirectional CHAP name

fields.name: msecret
fields.description: Bidirectional CHAP secret

fields.name: ig_tag
fields.description: Existing initiator group tag

fields.name: pg_tag
fields.description: Existing portal group tag

fields.name: host
fields.description: Hostname or IP address

fields.name: port
fields.description: Port number

fields.name: trtype
fields.description: Transport type ("RDMA")

fields.name: adrfam
fields.description: Address family ("IPv4", "IPv6", "IB", or "FC")

fields.name: traddr
fields.description: Transport address

fields.name: trsvcid
fields.description: Transport service ID (required for RDMA or TCP)

fields.name: nsid
fields.description: Namespace ID between 1 and 4294967294, inclusive. Default: Automatically assign NSID.

fields.name: bdev_name
fields.description: Name of bdev to expose as a namespace.

fields.name: nguid
fields.description: 16-byte namespace globally unique identifier in hexadecimal (e.g. "ABCDEF0123456789ABCDEF0123456789")

fields.name: eui64
fields.description: 8-byte namespace EUI-64 in hexadecimal (e.g. "ABCDEF0123456789")

fields.name: ptpl_file
fields.description: File path to save/restore persistent reservation information

fields.name: anagrpid
fields.description: ANA group ID. Default: Namespace ID.

fields.name: hide_metadata
fields.description: Enable hide_metadata option to the bdev. Default: false

fields.name: identify_ctrlr
fields.description: If true, enables custom identify handler that reports some identify attributes from the underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: identify_uuid_list
fields.description: If true, enables passthru identify UUID list (0x17 CNS) admin cmds for underlying NVMe device

fields.name: get_log_page
fields.description: If true, enables passthru get log page command handlers for underlying NVMe drive (for non-fabrics related log pages)

fields.name: get_set_features
fields.description: If true, enables passthru get/set_feature OPC handlers for underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: sanitize
fields.description: If true, enables passthru sanitize OPC handlers for underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: security_send_recv
fields.description: If true, enables passthru security send/recieve OPC handlers for underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: fw_update
fields.description: If true, enables passthru firmware download/commit OPC handlers for underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: nvme_mi
fields.description: If true, enables passthru NVMe-MI send/recieve OPC handlers for underlying NVMe drive

fields.name: vendor_specific
fields.description: If true, enables passthru command handlers for underlying NVMe drive for vendor specific cmds (OPCs: 0xC0-0xFF)

fields.name: bdev
fields.description: Backing bdev name or Null if bdev is hot-removed

fields.name: readonly
fields.description: True if controllers is readonly, false otherwise

fields.name: target_name
fields.description: Name of this SCSI target

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique SPDK global SCSI target ID

fields.name: scsi_dev_num
fields.description: SCSI target ID initiator will see when scanning this controller

fields.name: luns
fields.description: array of objects describing @ref rpc_vhost_get_controllers_scsi_luns

fields.name: id
fields.description: SCSI LUN ID

fields.name: bdev_name
fields.description: Backing bdev name

fields.name: nsid
fields.description: Namespace ID

fields.name: bdev
fields.description: Backing bdev name

params.name: sig_name
params.description: Signal to send (SIGINT, SIGTERM, SIGQUIT, SIGHUP, or SIGKILL)

params.name: enabled
params.description: Enable (`true`) or disable (`false`) monitoring (omit this parameter to query the current state)

params.name: current
params.description: Get an array of RPC methods only callable in the current state.

params.name: core_limit
params.description: Load limit on the core to be considered full (dynamic only)

params.name: core_busy
params.description: Indicates at what load on core scheduler should move threads to a different core (dynamic only)

params.name: scheduling_core
params.description: Main core of scheduler. Idle threads move to the scheduling core. Can be set only once

params.name: isolated_core_mask
params.description: Select CPU cores to isolate from scheduling changes. Can be set only once

params.name: name
params.description: bdev, nvmf_rdma, nvmf_tcp, scsi, iscsi_conn, ftl, all

params.name: name
params.description: bdev, nvmf_rdma, nvmf_tcp, scsi, iscsi_conn, ftl

params.name: tpoint_mask
params.description: mask to enable tracepoints inside a group

params.name: name
params.description: bdev, nvmf_rdma, nvmf_tcp, scsi, iscsi_conn, ftl

params.name: tpoint_mask
params.description: mask to diesable tracepoints inside a group

params.name: key2
params.description: Optional 2nd part of the key or a tweak in **hex** form

params.name: tweak_mode
params.description: Tweak mode to use: SIMPLE_LBA, JOIN_NEG_LBA_WITH_LBA, INCR_512_FULL_LBA, INCR_512_UPPER_LBA. Default is SIMPLE_LBA

params.name: key_name
params.description: If specified, return info about a specific key

params.name: small_cache_size
params.description: Size of the small iobuf cache

params.name: large_cache_size
params.description: Size of the large iobuf cache

params.name: task_count
params.description: Maximum number of tasks per IO channel

params.name: sequence_count
params.description: Maximum number of sequences per IO channel

params.name: buf_count
params.description: Maximum number of accel buffers per IO channel

params.name: type
params.description: Type of errors to inject ("corrupt": corrupt the data, "failure": fail the operation, "disable": disable error injection).

params.name: count
params.description: Numbers of errors to inject on each IO channel (`UINT64_MAX` by default).

params.name: errcode
params.description: Error code to inject (only relevant for type=failure).

params.name: config_kernel_mode
params.description: If set, will use kernel idxd driver.

params.name: driver_name
params.description: The driver, can be one of crypto_aesni_mb, crypto_qat or mlx5_pci

params.name: num_requests
params.description: Size of the shared requests pool

params.name: bdev_io_pool_size
params.description: Number of spdk_bdev_io structures in shared buffer pool

params.name: bdev_io_cache_size
params.description: Maximum number of spdk_bdev_io structures cached per thread

params.name: bdev_auto_examine
params.description: If set to false, the bdev layer will not examine every disks automatically

params.name: iobuf_small_cache_size
params.description: Size of the small iobuf per thread cache

params.name: iobuf_large_cache_size
params.description: Size of the large iobuf per thread cache

params.name: timeout
params.description: Time (ms) to wait for a bdev with specified name to appear

params.name: per_channel
params.description: Display per channel data for specified block device.

params.name: reset_mode
params.description: Mode to reset I/O statistics after obtaining it: all, maxmin, none (default: none)

params.name: mode
params.description: Mode to reset I/O statistics: all, maxmin, none (default: all)

params.name: enable
params.description: Enable or disable histogram on specified device

params.name: min_nsec
params.description: Min value in nanoseconds to track. Default: 1000 (1us)

params.name: max_nsec
params.description: Max value in nanoseconds to track. Default: 120000000000 (120 seconds)

params.name: rw_ios_per_sec
params.description: Number of R/W I/Os per second to allow. 0 means unlimited.

params.name: rw_mbytes_per_sec
params.description: Number of R/W megabytes per second to allow. 0 means unlimited.

params.name: r_mbytes_per_sec
params.description: Number of Read megabytes per second to allow. 0 means unlimited.

params.name: w_mbytes_per_sec
params.description: Number of Write megabytes per second to allow. 0 means unlimited.

params.name: period
params.description: period (in microseconds).If set to 0, polling will be disabled.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the crypto vbdev to create

params.name: crypto_pmd
params.description: Name of the crypto device driver. Obsolete, see accel_crypto_key_create

params.name: key
params.description: Key in hex form. Obsolete, see accel_crypto_key_create

params.name: cipher
params.description: Cipher to use, AES_CBC or AES_XTS (QAT and MLX5). Obsolete, see accel_crypto_key_create

params.name: key2
params.description: 2nd key in hex form only required for cipher AET_XTS. Obsolete, see accel_crypto_key_create

params.name: key_name
params.description: Name of the key created with accel_crypto_key_create

params.name: mode
params.description: OCF cache mode: wb, wt, pt, wa, wi, wo

params.name: cache_line_size
params.description: OCF cache line size in KiB: 4, 8, 16, 32, 64

params.name: name
params.description: Name of OCF vbdev or name of cache device or name of core device

params.name: mode
params.description: OCF cache mode: wb, wt, pt, wa, wi, wo

params.name: policy
params.description: Sequential cutoff policy: always, full, never

params.name: block_size
params.description: Data block size in bytes -must be multiple of 512

params.name: optimal_io_boundary
params.description: Split on optimal IO boundary, in number of blocks, default 0

params.name: md_size
params.description: Metadata size for this bdev (0, 8, 16, 32, 64, or 128). Default is 0.

params.name: md_interleave
params.description: Metadata location, interleaved if true, and separated if false. Default is false.

params.name: dif_type
params.description: Protection information type. Parameter --md-size needs to be set along --dif-type. Default=0 - no protection.

params.name: dif_is_head_of_md
params.description: Protection information is in the first 8 bytes of metadata. Default=false.

params.name: physical_block_size
params.description: Physical block size of device; must be a power of 2 and at least 512

params.name: md_size
params.description: Metadata size for this bdev. Default=0.

params.name: dif_type
params.description: Protection information type. Parameter --md-size needs to be set along --dif-type. Default=0 - no protection.

params.name: dif_is_head_of_md
params.description: Protection information is in the first 8 bytes of metadata. Default=false.

params.name: fallocate
params.description: Enable UNMAP and WRITE ZEROES support. Intended only for testing purposes due to synchronous syscall.

params.name: action_on_timeout
params.description: Action to take on command time out: none, reset or abort

params.name: timeout_us
params.description: Timeout for each command, in microseconds. If 0, don't track timeouts

params.name: timeout_admin_us
params.description: Timeout for each admin command, in microseconds. If 0, treat same as io timeouts ('timeout_us')

params.name: keep_alive_timeout_ms
params.description: Keep alive timeout period in milliseconds, default is 10s

params.name: arbitration_burst
params.description: The value is expressed as a power of two, a value of 111b indicates no limit

params.name: low_priority_weight
params.description: The maximum number of commands that the controller may launch at one time from a low priority queue

params.name: medium_priority_weight
params.description: The maximum number of commands that the controller may launch at one time from a medium priority queue

params.name: high_priority_weight
params.description: The maximum number of commands that the controller may launch at one time from a high priority queue

params.name: nvme_adminq_poll_period_us
params.description: How often the admin queue is polled for asynchronous events in microseconds

params.name: nvme_ioq_poll_period_us
params.description: How often I/O queues are polled for completions, in microseconds. Default: 0 (as fast as possible).

params.name: io_queue_requests
params.description: The number of requests allocated for each NVMe I/O queue. Default: 512.

params.name: delay_cmd_submit
params.description: Enable delaying NVMe command submission to allow batching of multiple commands. Default: `true`.

params.name: transport_retry_count
params.description: The number of attempts per I/O in the transport layer before an I/O fails.

params.name: bdev_retry_count
params.description: The number of attempts per I/O in the bdev layer before an I/O fails. -1 means infinite retries.

params.name: transport_ack_timeout
params.description: Time to wait ack until retransmission for RDMA or connection close for TCP. Range 0-31 where 0 means use default.

params.name: ctrlr_loss_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before deleting ctrlr.  -1 means infinite reconnects. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: reconnect_delay_sec
params.description: Time to delay a reconnect trial. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: fast_io_fail_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before failing I/O to ctrlr. 0 means no such timeout.

params.name: disable_auto_failback
params.description: Disable automatic failback. The RPC bdev_nvme_set_preferred_path can be used to do manual failback.

params.name: generate_uuids
params.description: Enable generation of UUIDs for NVMe bdevs that do not provide this value themselves.

params.name: transport_tos
params.description: IPv4 Type of Service value. Only applicable for RDMA transport. Default: 0 (no TOS is applied).

params.name: rdma_srq_size
params.description: Set the size of a shared rdma receive queue. Default: 0 (disabled).

params.name: io_path_stat
params.description: Enable collecting I/O stat of each nvme bdev io path. Default: `false`.

params.name: allow_accel_sequence
params.description: Allow NVMe bdevs to advertise support for accel sequences if the controller also supports them.  Default: `false`.

params.name: rdma_max_cq_size
params.description: Set the maximum size of a rdma completion queue. Default: 0 (unlimited)

params.name: rdma_cm_event_timeout_ms
params.description: Time to wait for RDMA CM events. Default: 0 (0 means using default value of driver).

params.name: dhchap_dhgroups
params.description: List of allowed DH-HMAC-CHAP DH groups.

params.name: rdma_umr_per_io
params.description: Enable/disable scatter-gather UMR per IO in RDMA transport if supported by system

params.name: tcp_connect_timeout_ms
params.description: Time to wait until TCP connection is done. Default: 0 (no timeout).

params.name: enable_flush
params.description: If true, pass flush to nvme devices when volatile write cache is present. Default : `false`.

params.name: enable
params.description: True to enable, false to disable

params.name: period_us
params.description: How often to poll for hot-insert and hot-remove events. Values: 0 - reset/use default or 1 to 10000000.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the NVMe controller, prefix for each bdev name

params.name: trtype
params.description: NVMe-oF target trtype: rdma or pcie

params.name: traddr
params.description: NVMe-oF target address: ip or BDF

params.name: adrfam
params.description: NVMe-oF target adrfam: ipv4, ipv6, ib, fc, intra_host

params.name: priority
params.description: Transport connection priority. Supported by TCP transport with POSIX sock module (see socket(7) man page).

params.name: prchk_reftag
params.description: Enable checking of PI reference tag for I/O processing

params.name: prchk_guard
params.description: Enable checking of PI guard for I/O processing

params.name: multipath
params.description: Multipathing behavior: disable, failover, multipath. Default is failover.

params.name: num_io_queues
params.description: The number of IO queues to request during initialization. Range: (0, UINT16_MAX + 1], Default is 1024.

params.name: ctrlr_loss_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before deleting ctrlr.  -1 means infinite reconnects. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: reconnect_delay_sec
params.description: Time to delay a reconnect trial. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: fast_io_fail_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before failing I/O to ctrlr. 0 means no such timeout.

params.name: psk
params.description: Name of the pre-shared key to be used for TLS (Enables SSL socket implementation for TCP)

params.name: max_bdevs
params.description: The size of the name array for newly created bdevs. Default is 128.

params.name: dhchap_key
params.description: DH-HMAC-CHAP key name (required if controller key is specified)

params.name: allow_unrecognized_csi
params.description: Allow attaching namespaces with unrecognized command set identifiers. These will only support NVMe passthrough.

params.name: trtype
params.description: NVMe-oF target trtype: rdma or tcp

params.name: traddr
params.description: NVMe-oF target address: ip or BDF

params.name: adrfam
params.description: NVMe-oF target adrfam: ipv4, ipv6, ib, fc, intra_host

params.name: name
params.description: NVMe controller name (or NVMe bdev controller name for multipath)

params.name: cntlid
params.description: NVMe controller ID (used as NVMe controller name for multipath)

params.name: name
params.description: NVMe controller name (or NVMe bdev controller name for multipath)

params.name: cntlid
params.description: NVMe controller ID (used as NVMe controller name for multipath)

params.name: name
params.description: NVMe controller name (or NVMe bdev controller name for multipath)

params.name: cntlid
params.description: NVMe controller ID (used as NVMe controller name for multipath)

params.name: trtype
params.description: NVMe-oF target trtype: rdma or tcp

params.name: wait_for_attach
params.description: Wait to complete until all discovered NVM subsystems are attached

params.name: attach_timeout_ms
params.description: Time to wait until the discovery and all discovered NVM subsystems are attached

params.name: ctrlr_loss_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before deleting ctrlr.  -1 means infinite reconnects. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: reconnect_delay_sec
params.description: Time to delay a reconnect trial. 0 means no reconnect.

params.name: fast_io_fail_timeout_sec
params.description: Time to wait until ctrlr is reconnected before failing I/O to ctrlr. 0 means no such timeout.

params.name: selector
params.description: Multipath selector: round_robin or queue_depth, used in active-active mode. Default is round_robin

params.name: rr_min_io
params.description: Number of I/Os routed to current io path before switching to another for round-robin selector. The min value is 1.

params.name: dhchap_key
params.description: DH-HMAC-CHAP key name (required if controller key is specified)

params.name: optimal_open_zones
params.description: Number of zones required to reach optimal write speed

params.name: filename
params.description: filename of the firmware to download

params.name: bdev_name
params.description: Name of the NVMe block device

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the NVMe bdev controller

params.name: config_file
params.description: File path of librados configuration file

params.name: key_file
params.description: File path of librados key file

params.name: core_mask
params.description: Core mask for librados IO context threads

params.name: cluster_name
params.description: Rados cluster object name created in this module.

params.name: new_size
params.description: New bdev size for resize operation in MiB

params.name: latency_type
params.description: One of: avg_read, avg_write, p99_read, p99_write

params.name: latency_us
params.description: The new latency value in microseconds

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the error injection bdev

params.name: num
params.description: the number of commands you want to fail.(default:1)

params.name: queue_depth
params.description: the queue depth at which to trigger the error

params.name: corrupt_offset
params.description: the offset in bytes to xor with corrupt_value

params.name: corrupt_value
params.description: the value for xor (1-255, 0 is invalid)

params.name: timeout_sec
params.description: Timeout for command, in seconds, if 0, don't track timeout

params.name: uuid
params.description: UUID of restored bdev (not applicable when creating new instance)

params.name: core_mask
params.description: CPU core(s) possible for placement of the ftl core thread, application main thread by default

params.name: overprovisioning
params.description: Percentage of base device used for relocation, 20% by default

params.name: fast_shutdown
params.description: When set FTL will minimize persisted data on target application shutdown and rely on shared memory during next load

params.name: l2p_dram_limit
params.description: DRAM limit for most recent L2P addresses (default 2048 MiB)

params.name: core_mask
params.description: CPU core(s) possible for placement of the ftl core thread, application main thread by default

params.name: overprovisioning
params.description: Percentage of base device used for relocation, 20% by default

params.name: fast_shutdown
params.description: When set FTL will minimize persisted data on target application shutdown and rely on shared memory during next load

params.name: l2p_dram_limit
params.description: DRAM limit for most recent L2P addresses (default 2048 MiB)

params.name: fast_shutdown
params.description: When set FTL will minimize persisted data during deletion and rely on shared memory during next load

params.name: fast_shutdown
params.description: When set FTL will minimize persisted data during deletion and rely on shared memory during next load

params.name: property
params.description: Name of the property to modify

params.name: value
params.description: New value of the property to be set

params.name: name
params.description: name of xNVMe bdev to create

params.name: io_mechanism
params.description: IO mechanism to use (ex: libaio, io_uring, io_uring_cmd, etc.)

params.name: conserve_cpu
params.description: Whether or not to conserve CPU when polling (default: false)

params.name: name
params.description: name of xnvme bdev to delete

params.name: name
params.description: Virtio SCSI base bdev name or Virtio Blk bdev name

params.name: trtype
params.description: Virtio target trtype: pci or user

params.name: traddr
params.description: target address: BDF or UNIX socket file path

params.name: dev_type
params.description: Virtio device type: blk or scsi

params.name: vq_count
params.description: Number of queues this controller will utilize (default: 1)

params.name: vq_size
params.description: Size of each queue. Must be power of 2. (default: 512)

params.name: enable
params.description: Enable or disable the virtio blk hotplug monitor

params.name: period_us
params.description: The period time of the monitor

params.name: auth_file
params.description: Path to CHAP shared secret file (default: "")

params.name: node_base
params.description: Prefix of the name of iSCSI target node (default: "iqn.2016-06.io.spdk")

params.name: nop_timeout
params.description: Timeout in seconds to nop-in request to the initiator (default: 60)

params.name: nop_in_interval
params.description: Time interval in secs between nop-in requests by the target (default: 30)

params.name: disable_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be disabled (default: `false`)

params.name: require_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be required (default: `false`)

params.name: mutual_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be unidirectional (`false`) or bidirectional (`true`) (default: `false`)

params.name: chap_group
params.description: CHAP group ID for discovery session (default: 0)

params.name: max_sessions
params.description: Maximum number of sessions in the host (default: 128)

params.name: max_queue_depth
params.description: Maximum number of outstanding I/Os per queue (default: 64)

params.name: max_large_datain_per_connection
params.description: Max number of outstanding split read I/Os per connection (default: 64)

params.name: max_r2t_per_connection
params.description: Max number of outstanding R2Ts per connection (default: 4)

params.name: pdu_pool_size
params.description: Number of PDUs in the pool (default: approximately 2 * max_sessions * (max_queue_depth + max_connections_per_session))

params.name: immediate_data_pool_size
params.description: Number of immediate data buffers in the pool (default: 128 * max_sessions)

params.name: data_out_pool_size
params.description: Number of data out buffers in the pool (default: 16 * max_sessions)

params.name: disable_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be disabled (default: `false`)

params.name: require_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be required (default: `false`)

params.name: mutual_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be unidirectional (`false`) or bidirectional (`true`) (default: `false`)

params.name: chap_group
params.description: CHAP group ID for discovery session (default: 0)

params.name: initiators
params.description: Not empty array of initiator hostnames or IP addresses

params.name: netmasks
params.description: Not empty array of initiator netmasks

params.name: initiators
params.description: Array of initiator hostnames or IP addresses

params.name: initiators
params.description: Array of initiator hostnames or IP addresses

params.name: luns
params.description: Array of Bdev names to LUN ID mappings

params.name: disable_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be disabled for this target

params.name: require_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be required for this target

params.name: mutual_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be bidirectional (`true`) or unidirectional (`false`)

params.name: chap_group
params.description: Authentication group ID for this target node

params.name: header_digest
params.description: Header Digest should be required for this target node

params.name: data_digest
params.description: Data Digest should be required for this target node

params.name: disable_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be disabled for this target

params.name: require_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be required for this target

params.name: mutual_chap
params.description: CHAP authentication should be bidirectional (`true`) or unidirectional (`false`)

params.name: chap_group
params.description: Authentication group ID for this target node

params.name: pg_ig_maps
params.description: Not empty array of initiator to portal group mappings objects

params.name: pg_ig_maps
params.description: Not empty array of Portal to Initiator group mappings objects

params.name: private
params.description: When true, portals in this group are not returned by a discovery session. Used for login redirection. (default: `false`)

params.name: wait
params.description: When true, do not listen on portals until it is started explicitly. (default: `false`)

params.name: disable_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be disabled (default: `false`)

params.name: require_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be required (default: `false`)

params.name: mutual_chap
params.description: CHAP for discovery session should be unidirectional (`false`) or bidirectional (`true`) (default: `false`)

params.name: chap_group
params.description: CHAP group ID for discovery session (default: 0)

params.name: bdev_name
params.description: bdev name to be added as a LUN

params.name: redirect_host
params.description: Numeric IP address to which the target node is redirected

params.name: redirect_port
params.description: Numeric TCP port to which the target node is redirected

params.name: enable
params.description: Enable or disable histogram on specified target node

params.name: max_queue_depth
params.description: Max number of outstanding I/O per queue

params.name: max_io_qpairs_per_ctrlr
params.description: Max number of IO qpairs per controller

params.name: in_capsule_data_size
params.description: Max number of in-capsule data size

params.name: max_aq_depth
params.description: Max number of admin cmds per AQ

params.name: num_shared_buffers
params.description: The number of pooled data buffers available to the transport

params.name: buf_cache_size
params.description: The number of shared buffers to reserve for each poll group

params.name: zcopy
params.description: Use zero-copy operations if the underlying bdev supports them

params.name: num_cqe
params.description: The number of CQ entries. Only used when no_srq=true (RDMA only)

params.name: max_srq_depth
params.description: The number of elements in a per-thread shared receive queue (RDMA only)

params.name: no_srq
params.description: Disable shared receive queue even for devices that support it. (RDMA only)

params.name: dif_insert_or_strip
params.description: Enable DIF insert for write I/O and DIF strip for read I/O DIF

params.name: sock_priority
params.description: The socket priority of the connection owned by this transport (TCP only)

params.name: acceptor_backlog
params.description: The number of pending connections allowed in backlog before failing new connection attempts (RDMA only)

params.name: abort_timeout_sec
params.description: Abort execution timeout value, in seconds

params.name: control_msg_num
params.description: The number of control messages per poll group (TCP only)

params.name: disable_mappable_bar0
params.description: disable client mmap() of BAR0 (VFIO-USER only)

params.name: acceptor_poll_rate
params.description: Polling interval of the acceptor for incoming connections (microseconds)

params.name: data_wr_pool_size
params.description: RDMA data WR pool size (RDMA only)

params.name: kas
params.description: The granularity of the KATO (Keep Alive Timeout) in 100 millisecond units

params.name: min_kato
params.description: The minimum Keep Alive Timeout value in milliseconds

params.name: max_namespaces
params.description: Maximum number of namespaces that can be attached to the subsystem. Default: 32 (also used if user specifies 0)

params.name: allow_any_host
params.description: Allow any host (`true`) or enforce allowed host list (`false`). Default: `false`

params.name: passthrough
params.description: Use NVMe passthrough for I/O commands and namespace-directed admin commands. Default: `false`

params.name: secure_channel
params.description: Whether all connections immediately attempt to establish a secure channel

params.name: sock_impl
params.description: The socket implementation to use for the listener

params.name: no_auto_visible
params.description: Namespace is not automatically visible to controllers (default: false)

params.name: host
params.description: Host NQN to add to the list of allowed host NQNs

params.name: psk
params.description: Path to a file containing PSK for TLS connection

params.name: dhchap_key
params.description: DH-HMAC-CHAP key name (required if controller key is specified)

params.name: host
params.description: Host NQN to remove from the list of allowed host NQNs

params.name: allow_any_host
params.description: Allow any host (`true`) or enforce allowed host list (`false`).

params.name: dhchap_key
params.description: DH-HMAC-CHAP key name (required if controller key is specified)

params.name: secure_channel
params.description: The connection to that discovery subsystem requires a secure channel

params.name: poll_groups_mask
params.description: Set cpumask for NVMf poll groups

params.name: discovery_filter
params.description: Set discovery filter, possible values are: `match_any` (default) or comma separated values: `transport`, `address`, `svcid`

params.name: dhchap_dhgroups
params.description: List of allowed DH-HMAC-CHAP DH groups.

params.name: tag
params.description: Virtio FS tag according to the virtio specification

params.name: iops_threshold
params.description: Coalescing activation level greater than 0 in IO per second

params.name: delay
params.description: If true, delay the controller startup.

params.name: scsi_target_num
params.description: SCSI target ID between 0 and 7 or -1 to use first free ID.

params.name: bdev_name
params.description: Name of bdev to expose as a LUN 0

params.name: dev_name
params.description: Name of bdev to expose block device

params.name: readonly
params.description: If true, this target will be read only (default: false)

params.name: bdev_name
params.description: Bdev on which to construct logical volume store

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Name of the logical volume store to create

params.name: cluster_sz
params.description: Cluster size of the logical volume store in bytes (Default: 4MiB)

params.name: clear_method
params.description: Change clear method for data region. Available: none, unmap (default), write_zeroes

params.name: md_page_size
params.description: Metadata page size of the logical volume store in bytes (Default: max(4KB, bdev phys blocklen)

params.name: uuid
params.description: UUID of the logical volume store to destroy

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Name of the logical volume store to destroy

params.name: uuid
params.description: UUID of the logical volume store to retrieve information about

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Name of the logical volume store to retrieve information about

params.name: uuid
params.description: UUID of the logical volume store to grow

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Name of the logical volume store to grow

params.name: lvol_name
params.description: Name of logical volume to create

params.name: size_in_mib
params.description: Desired size of logical volume in MiB

params.name: uuid
params.description: UUID of logical volume store to create logical volume on

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Name of logical volume store to create logical volume on

params.name: clear_method
params.description: Change default data clusters clear method. Available: none, unmap, write_zeroes

params.name: lvol_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to create a snapshot from

params.name: snapshot_name
params.description: Name for the newly created snapshot

params.name: snapshot_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the snapshot to clone

params.name: clone_name
params.description: Name for the logical volume to create

params.name: bdev
params.description: Name or UUID for bdev that acts as the external snapshot

params.name: clone_name
params.description: Name for the logical volume to create

params.name: old_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the existing logical volume

params.name: name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to resize

params.name: size_in_mib
params.description: Desired size of the logical volume in MiB

params.name: name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to set as read only

params.name: name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to destroy

params.name: name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to inflate

params.name: name
params.description: UUID or alias of the logical volume to decouple the parent of it

params.name: lvs_uuid
params.description: Only show volumes in the logical volume store with this UUID

params.name: lvs_name
params.description: Only show volumes in the logical volume store with this name

params.name: lvol_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the lvol to set parent of

params.name: parent_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the snapshot to become parent of lvol

params.name: lvol_name
params.description: UUID or alias of the lvol to set external parent of

params.name: parent_name
params.description: UUID or name of the external snapshot to become parent of lvol

params.name: src_lvol_name
params.description: UUID or alias of lvol to create a copy from

params.name: dst_bdev_name
params.description: Name of the bdev that acts as destination for the copy

params.name: process_window_size_kb
params.description: Background process (e.g. rebuild) window size in KiB

params.name: process_max_bandwidth_mb_sec
params.description: Background process (e.g. rebuild) maximum bandwidth in MiB/Sec

params.name: category
params.description: all or online or configuring or offline

params.name: base_bdevs
params.description: Base bdevs name, whitespace separated list in quotes

params.name: superblock
params.description: If set, information about raid bdev will be stored in superblock on each base bdev (default: `false`)

params.name: split_size_mb
params.description: size in MB to restrict the size

params.name: block_size
params.description: block size of device (If omitted, get the block size from the file)

params.name: name
params.description: name of uring bdev to rescan

params.name: name
params.description: name of uring bdev to delete

params.name: nvme_ctrlr_name
params.description: name of nvme ctrlr that supports OPAL

params.name: id
params.description: First Event ID to fetch (default: first available).

params.name: max
params.description: Maximum number of event to return (default: no limit).

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the key to add.

params.name: path
params.description: Path to a file containing the key.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the key to remove.

params.name: impl_name
params.description: Name of socket implementation, e.g. posix

params.name: impl_name
params.description: Name of socket implementation, e.g. posix

params.name: recv_buf_size
params.description: Size of socket receive buffer in bytes

params.name: send_buf_size
params.description: Size of socket send buffer in bytes

params.name: enable_zerocopy_send_server
params.description: Enable or disable zero copy on send for server sockets

params.name: enable_zerocopy_send_client
params.description: Enable or disable zero copy on send for client sockets

params.name: zerocopy_threshold
params.description: Set zerocopy_threshold in bytes. A consecutive sequence of requests' iovecs that fall below this threshold may be sent without zerocopy flag set

params.name: tls_version
params.description: TLS protocol version, e.g. 13 for v1.3 (only applies when impl_name == ssl)

params.name: enable_ktls
params.description: Enable or disable Kernel TLS (only applies when impl_name == ssl)

params.name: impl_name
params.description: Name of socket implementation, e.g. posix

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the operating NVMe controller

params.name: cmd_type
params.description: Type of nvme cmd. Valid values are: admin, io

params.name: data_direction
params.description: Direction of data transfer. Valid values are: c2h, h2c

params.name: cmdbuf
params.description: NVMe command encoded by base64 urlsafe

params.name: data
params.description: Data transferring to controller from host, encoded by base64 urlsafe

params.name: metadata
params.description: Metadata transferring to controller from host, encoded by base64 urlsafe

params.name: data_len
params.description: Data length required to transfer from controller to host

params.name: metadata_len
params.description: Metadata length required to transfer from controller to host

params.name: timeout_ms
params.description: Command execution timeout value, in milliseconds

params.name: addr
params.description: Address of the device to remove.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the operating NVMe controller

params.name: cmd_type
params.description: Type of NVMe command. Valid values are: admin, io

params.name: opc
params.description: Opcode for which the error injection is applied

params.name: do_not_submit
params.description: Set to true if request should not be submitted to the controller (default false)

params.name: timeout_in_us
params.description: Wait specified microseconds when do_not_submit is true

params.name: err_count
params.description: Number of matching NVMe commands to inject errors

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the operating NVMe controller

params.name: cmd_type
params.description: Type of NVMe command. Valid values are: admin, io

params.name: opc
params.description: Opcode for which the error injection is applied

params.name: pool
params.description: DAOS pool label or its uuid

params.name: cont
params.description: DAOS cont label or its uuid

params.name: block_size
params.description: Block size in bytes -must be multiple of 512

params.name: small_pool_count
params.description: Number of small buffers in the global pool

params.name: large_pool_count
params.description: Number of large buffers in the global pool

params.name: enable_numa
params.description: Enable per-NUMA node buffer pools. Each node will allocate a full pool based on small_pool_count and large_pool_count.

params.name: name
params.description: Prefix for NVMe discovery services found

params.name: name
params.description: Name of mDNS discovery instance to stop

params.name: fsdev_io_pool_size
params.description: Size of fsdev IO objects pool.

params.name: fsdev_io_cache_size
params.description: Size of fsdev IO objects cache per thread.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the AIO fsdev to create.

params.name: root_path
params.description: Path on the system directory to be exposed as an SPDK filesystem

params.name: enable_xattr
params.description: true to enable the extended attributes, false otherwise

params.name: enable_writeback_cache
params.description: true to enable the writeback cache, false otherwise

params.name: skip_rw
params.description: Skip processing read and write requests and complete them successfully immediately. This is useful for benchmarking.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the AIO fsdev to delete.
